channel.title: Make a 10x Hit Bar optional with normal ?/ EXP Lock/ How to get D Claws?
channel.description:
It's client sided i know, 'public static boolean newDamage =' But, i was wondering if there was a code/command where it could make it possible to turn it off without wrecking it for other players who want it there?
Also for EXP Lock, i have another source that has it. Would it be possible to steal the interface from that source to my new source ?
And last, how do i get dragon claws for my source? I know it goes in 'ItemDef.java' but im not quite sure how to like add it to the game ?
Thanks in advanced :D

item.title: Make a 10x Hit Bar optional with normal ?/ EXP Lock/ How to get D Claws?
item.dc:creator: @stefano1911 stefano1911
item.description:
@stefano1911 wrote:

for problem 1,2 you have to do alot client/server side

dragon claws i easy search on google.

next time if u create a topic
put this in:

which source u got? Delta,PI?
explain what u already tryed?

Read full topic
